response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we are confident it will also bring unparalleled benefits to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the time invested in its creation, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We believe this is a fair and generous offer that reflects the true worth of our product. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 12000}
